H0.text: Digestive system consists of organs that break down food and absorb nutrients such as glucose.

H1.text: Cardiovascular system consists of organs that break down food and absorb nutrients such as glucose.

H2.text: Physical system is the system that consists of organs that break down food and absorb nutrients such as glucose.

H3.text: The skeletal system consists of organs that break down food and absorb nutrients such as glucose.

A4.text: Most of the digestion of food takes place in the small intestine. Water and some minerals are reabsorbed back into the blood in the large intestine.

A5.text: The exocrine part of the pancreas secretes digestive enzymes.
